data.title: Emergency Earthquake Relief Needed
data.summary: The vulnerable communities in Morocco faced severe impacts from the 6.8-magnitude earthquake. Tragically, over 2,000 lives were lost, with thousands more injured. Many awaiting rescue.

featuredImage.alt: Africa Relief: Morocco Earthquake Relief Fund Aid

data.title: Libya Floods
data.summary: The Floods have devastated the city of Derna, killing thousands and leaving at least 10,000 missing. The local community needs your urgent support.

featuredImage.alt: Families affected by the floods in Libya receiving much-needed aid and assistance

data.title: Ghana Floods
data.summary: Southeastern Ghana faces escalating displacements post Akosombo Dam water release on Oct 13. Your support matters.

featuredImage.alt: Donate to ghana: Streets submerged in floodwaters, illustrating the extent of flooding in Ghana.
